info.name: User
info.description:
UserService:

/Login:

Getting BaseURL Email And Password From Production Env

verify credentails with Cognito and if authenticates then return the token as other routes are JWT Authorized  
First Set the Enviroment To Production, this will set the Enviroment

After Sending the Post request, the post scripts run and will store the token in env so that it wont be passed again in every req by hardcoding

To create an account:  
[https://us-east-1tztbfdteg.auth.us-east-1.amazoncognito.com/login?client_id=2h3sunkm796h8e0ek6gqkblh9i&response_type=code&scope=email+openid+phone&redirect_uri=https://d84l1y8p4kdic.cloudfront.net](https://us-east-1tztbfdteg.auth.us-east-1.amazoncognito.com/login?client_id=2h3sunkm796h8e0ek6gqkblh9i&response_type=code&scope=email+openid+phone&redirect_uri=https://d84l1y8p4kdic.cloudfront.net)

Go to this and create and account

Also since in sandbox aws see doesnâ€™t allow sending mails to anyone who is not verified so go to

[https://us-east-1.console.aws.amazon.com/ses/home?region=us-east-1#/identities](https://us-east-1.console.aws.amazon.com/ses/home?region=us-east-1#/identities)[](https://us-east-1.console.aws.amazon.com/ses/home?region=us-east-1#/homepage)then in left sidebar **Configuration: Identities**

Then create identiy for the email which you made an account otherwise you will see error in creating reservations
